Chinese.name: ES写入函数
Chinese.description: 本示例通过使用ElasticSearch库，实现了将随机数写入ES。可为其配置定时触发器后，定时执行。

English.name: WriteToES
English.description: This demo uses ElasticSearch and timer trigger to write random number to ES
English.attention: When you use this demo, you should change the address of ES Server.
